stories: Once upon a time, there was a princess who lived in a faraway land. She was very happy, and loved her life. One day, she decided to go on a journey to find new and exciting things. She traveled to many different places, and had lots of fun experiences. Eventually, she found herself in a place she had never been before. It was a beautiful place, and she loved it. She decided to stay there, and make it her home.

Once upon a time there was a girl who was always happy. She never let anything get her down, and she always saw the best in people. Even when she was faced with difficulties, she found a way to smile through them. Everyone who knew her loved her for her positive attitude and her ability to make them feel happy, too.

Once upon a time there was a princess who was very unhappy. She had everything she ever wanted, but she was still unhappy. One day she met a boy who was also unhappy. He helped her learn how to be happy and not take things for granted. They fell in love and lived happily ever after.
